data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: There are times in life when people must know when not to let go. Balloons are designed to teach small children this.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: It is well known that a vital ingredient of success is not knowing that what you're attempting can't be done.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Fantasy is an exercise bicycle for the mind. It might not take you anywhere, but it tones up the muscles that can.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: If you don’t turn your life into a story, you just become a part of someone else’s story.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Stories of imagination tend to upset those without one.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Coming back to where you started is not the same as never leaving.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I become.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: If you trust in yourself and believe in your dreams and follow your star, you’ll still get beaten by people who spent their time working hard and learning things and weren’t so lazy.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Evil begins when you begin to treat people as things.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: They say a little knowledge is a dangerous thing, but it’s not one half so bad as a lot of ignorance.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: The presence of those seeking the truth is infinitely to be preferred to the presence of those who think they’ve found it.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Goodness is about what you do. Not who you pray to.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: It’s still magic even if you know how it’s done.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: It's not worth doing something unless you were doing something that someone, somewere, would much rather you weren't doing.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Real stupidity beats artificial intelligence every time

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: It is said that your life flashes before your eyes just before you die. That is true, it's called life

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Wisdom comes from experience. Experience is often a result of lack of wisdom

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Inside every sane person there’s a madman struggling to get out

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: So much universe, and so little time

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Inside every old person is a young person wondering what happened.
